Bias in LLMs for Robotics

data_loader module

Module to load results and group them by prompt category (comparison, generation, or categorisation).

data_loader.load_all(model)[source]

Load all results for a given model, group them by prompt category (comparison, generation, or categorisation), and write them to CSV files in the grouped_prompts folder.

Parameters:

model – The name of the model to load results for (should be same as folder name)

data_loader.load_from_csv(model, subset, type)[source]

Load a CSV file of results into a Pandas dataframe and return it.

Parameters:

  • model – The name of the model to load results for (should be same as folder name)

  • subset – The name of the subset to load results for (either task, recommendation, emotion, ownership, proxemics, or affordance)

  • type – the type of results to load (either seqs or scores)
